posts.post_content:
Looking to start a new set and have a LONG way to go.  I have two so far, need 178 more to complete the set!!!

Help a brother out!
Down to 176 more needed to complete the set!  Let me know if you have any to sell or trade to me.

I have this one for sale...make me an offer through email or pm. Slightly wavy bottom but not a bad stamp at all.

Joshua

[IMG]http://i170.photobucket.com/albums/u266/Wite3/Cards%20For%20Sale%202013/helmarchance.jpg[/IMG]
Hi Derek, you may be in luck -- please shoot me an email when you get a minute. Thanks, Brian

[quote name="Brian Campf" post=1147040]Hi Derek, you may be in luck -- please shoot me an email when you get a minute. Thanks, Brian[/QUOTE]

Brian - Thanks for the pleasant transaction and the extra knowledge on the set.  Hope to transact with you again in the future!!

Friendly bump...I'm a little over half way done now...

Still need several "commons" and only one HOfer (Cy Young).  I have several duplicates, including some key HOFers like WaJo, Wheat, Marquard, and Evers.  So I'm open to trades.

Please email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with Helmars you may have!

Thanks, Derek

Bumpy!!  

I'm slightly over 50% complete...happy to pay above market and give you some much-needed REA money!!

Bumpa wumpa!

Now close to 60% complete.  Happy to buy singles or lots to give YOU some much needed National moolah!

Please PM me or email me privately at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if you have any for sale (or trade).  I have plenty of trade bait!

I still need the following:

edited: See later post with updated list...

ttt, still need 57 more to complete the set.

God put me on earth to accomplish a certain number of things (including completing this set).  Right now, I'm so far behind I will never die!

[quote name="h2oya311" post=1448293]ttt, still need 57 more to complete the set.

God put me on earth to accomplish a certain number of things (including completing this set).  Right now, I'm so far behind I will never die![/QUOTE]

LOL...creative pitch, Derek :D.  Wish I could help, but I hope others do!

Cheers,
Blair

I only have [S]27[/S] 23 more (out of 180) before I'm done!  I need the following Helmar Stamps (virtually any condition will do):

Babe Adams, Pittsburgh, Nat.
Jimmy Archer, Chicago, Nat.
Jimmy Austin, St. Louis, Am.
Fred Beck, Philadelphia, Nat.
Bruno Block, Chicago, Am.
Ping Bodie, Chicago, Am.
[S]Ed Cicotte, Boston, Am.[/S] thanks Matt E (Epps)!

Art Fromme, Cincinatti, Nat.
George Gibson, Pittsburgh, Nat.
Solly Hoffman (Hofman), Chicago, Nat.
Johnny Kling, Boston, Nat.
Otto Knabe, Philadelphia, Nat.
Tommy Leach, Pittsburgh, Nat.
Paddy Livingston, Cleveland, Am.
Amby McConnell, Chicago, Am.
Fred Merkle, New York, Nat.
Earl Moore, Philadelphia, Nat.
Danny Murphy, Philadelphia, Am.
Marty O'Toole, Pittsburgh, Nat.
Slim Sallee, St. Louis, Nat.

Boss Schmidt, Detroit, Am.
Mike Simon, Pittsburgh, Nat.
Jack Warhop, New York, Am.
[S]Owen Wilson, Pittsburgh, Nat.[/S] thanks Dan B (Bliggity)!
Cy Young, Boston, Am.

I have several duplicates and am always happy to trade.  I also wouldn't mind a few upgrades, so reach out if you have any Helmars you want to part with!

Thanks,
Derek
There are some currently on Ebay from your wantlist!

bump to the top...

thanks to Dan B (Bliggity) and Matt E (Epps) and Dan D (FourStrikes) for helping me knock four more off the list!  Anyone else want to be "Santa's helper"?
